title: Need help for font identification
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100405192219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lettre_affluence_4640.jpg)

Hello all,

I need help identifying this logo, that's how I came accross this forum.

If anyone knows what this font is, I would gladly appreciate it.

I have been through identifont and whatthefont but cannot get a match.

Thank you!

Catherine
author: croy1

comments.content: This started life as Avant Garde. It was then artificially stretched and a poorly drawn A was added.
The A is a flopped U with a crossbar added, although without seeming regard to the width of the crossbar on the F immediately adjacent...
